title: Please Mr. President? | Guests: Bill O’Reilly & Chad Prather | 12/21/18
description:
Hour 1

Holiday Greetings from Santa 109.9 FM...Only the best music from Ann Murray and Men Without Hats? ...a Trump Tantrum is being played out right before our eyes?...Mad Dog Mattis is leaving the dog house?...General Mattis resigns = not good...Rips Trump on way out?...What is President Trump thinking? ...Turning our back on the Kurds once again...Turkey a key part of Trumps reasoning?...ISIS is still alive and well in the Middle-East...all of this is Great news for Iran..."Please Mr. President?..." Proof Inflation is Coming?

 

Hour 2 

Not a Good Month for the President?...Father Christmas, Bill O'Reilly to the Rescue?...The Trump Rating List: The Good, The Bad and the Don't Care?...the country will miss General Mattis resignation, hard shoes to fill... overall it's not that big of a deal...we're not getting out, Trump's just moving them (US troops) around?...the stock market is the BIG story?...the worst December stock market since 1931?...if the economy tanks, Trump 'will not be reelected'? ...no Big deal on the Bump stock ban?...Bill eats crow on letter of intent? ...Bruce Jenner promised a condo in Moscow?...the Organize Cabal to Destroy the President?

 

Hour 3

The Will Rogers of Conservatives? ...Comedian, Chad Prather joins to discuss his new show on Blaze TV "The Chad Prather Show"...YouTube'er making it big in the world of comedy ...Living In Sin with Sara Gonzales?...headed to the Dominican Republic to tie the knot...again? ...wait, Glenn Beck is a Ordained Shakey's Pizza Marriage Minister, who knew? ...Stu Plays 'Victim' to GB? and his 'Fake Ass Weave'?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
